MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.09pm due to a fault with our equipment in Galashiels and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:16PM on Wednesday 03 February 2021.
